section.section: The sections of this code specified in paragraph (c) of this subsection shall be carefully explained to each enlisted member at the time of, or within thirty (30) days after, the member's initial entrance into a duty status with the state military forces.

The sections shall be explained again:
After the member has completed basic or recruit training; and
Again at the time when the member reenlists.

text.section: The text of this code and of the regulations prescribed under such code shall be made available to any member of the state military forces, upon request by the member, for the member's personal examination.

law.history: Repealed, reenacted, renumbered, and amended 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 32, sec. 141, effective June 25, 2013. -- Amended 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 56, sec. 54. -- Created 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 76, effective July 1, 1954.
